original_title: Shin Seiki Evangerion: Genesis 0:0’ - The Light from the Darkness
overview: A promotional video for the film “Death and Rebirth.” Released on January 25, 1997, it contains an overview of the series’ plot, cast interviews, a music video for “Soul’s Refrain,” and several trailers for the film.
title: Neon Genesis Evangelion: Genesis 0:0’ - The Light from the Darkness
